author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the chopped steak into a mixing bowl. Add all the remaining ingredients except the egg yolk and toast and mix well. Place a chefs' ring onto a serving plate and fill with the steak mixture. To serve, remove the chefs' ring, top with the egg yolk and serve with toast.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz rump steak, trimmed and very finely chopped ,  ¼ red pepper, finely chopped,  50g/2oz green beans, finely sliced,  1 tbsp tomato ketchup,  few drops Tabasco sauce,  1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce,  ½ lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 free-range egg yolk ,  1 slice crusty bread, toasted and drizzled with oil
